tree.name: Clint Capela
tree.tradeDescription: Part of historic 7-team trade: Capela signed new 3yr/$21.5M deal facilitated as sign-and-trade from Atlanta
tree.note: Swiss center returns to Houston in historic 7-team deal; drafted by HOU in 2014, spent first 6 seasons here before 5 years in Atlanta

assetsGivenUp.name: David Roddy
assetsGivenUp.note: Two-way forward signed after being waived by Hawks and 76ers; sent to ATL in trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2031 2nd Round Pick Swap
assetsGivenUp.note: Second-round pick swap (protected 56-60) sent to Atlanta

assetsGivenUp.name: Cash Considerations
assetsGivenUp.note: Cash sent to Atlanta to facilitate sign-and-trade
